titleStmt.title: The poor man's dyal· With an instrument to set it. Made applicable to any place in England, Scotland, Ireland, &c. By Sir Samuel Morland knight and baronet. 1689.
titleStmt.author: Morland, Samuel, Sir, 1625-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: And are to be sold at all the button-sellers, cutlers and toyshops about the town. And will be shortly publisht in several other ... and dimensions, for the good of the publick, and for the con... of the manufacture of our nation,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.

person.persName: the conof the manufacture of our nation
